section.title: Creating a New Project
section.para: CloudPlatform administrators and domain administrators can create projects. If the global configuration parameter allow.user.create.projects is set to true, end users can also create projects.

listitem.para: Log in as administrator to the CloudPlatform UI.
In the left navigation, click Projects.
Give the project a name and description for display to users, then click Create Project.
A screen appears where you can immediately add more members to the project. This is optional. Click Next when you are ready to move on.
